content.rendered:
Reference is made to announcements from the company 07.06.2019 and 11.06.2019.

The shares in Aqualis ASA will be traded ex preferential rights as from today, 12.06.2019.

excerpt.rendered: Reference is made to announcements from the company 07.06.2019 and 11.06.2019. The shares in Aqualis ASA will be traded ex preferential rights as from today, 12.06.2019.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ex-dividend NOK 0.20 today
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The shares in AqualisBraemar ASA will be traded ex-dividend NOK 0.20 as from today, 2 November 2020.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Commencement of the subscription period for the rights issue
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the stock exchange announcement dated 21 June 2019 in which Aqualis ASA announced that a prospectus has been approved in connection to the rights issue...

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis completes acquisition of Braemar Technical Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the stock exchange notice dated 13 May 2019 where Aqualis ASA (the “Company”) and Braemar Shipping Services plc (“Braemar”) announced an agreement whereby the Company would acquire three business lines (Adjusting, Marine and Offshore, jointly “BTS”) from Braemar representing the majority of the Braemar Technical Services…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seafarers Awareness Week
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar’s Mark McGurran, group managing director of Marine, discusses the importance of our seafarers, especially at this time, looks back on his seafaring career and reflects on the challenge of looking for a career ashore and how we at AqualisBraemar strive to be that second career for seafarers.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ex-dividend NOK 0.20 today
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The shares in AqualisBraemar ASA will be traded ex-dividend NOK 0.20 as of today, 11 June 2020. This information is subject to the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dividend approval and Ex-date
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Annual General Meeting in AqualisBraemar ASA, held 10 June 2020 at 11am, approved the board proposal of distributing a dividend of NOK 0.20 per share.
